text: Hi everyone! I had no idea this was a thing, just found out through the Confocal list. I am an iSPIM user at the University of Vermont. Would be great to have this community, though I wonder if Slack is the right venue - Discord has no message history limit and AFAIK has all the functionality of Slack for free. I think the only real limit is 8MB filesize limit on uploads, but you can always link to external file hosting if needed.

text: Good morning everyone, same as Mel above, I'd love to join a lightsheet community! I took on building from scratch a single lens bessel beam 2p lightsheet, with zero experience when I started. That is fun ! Not always smooth for sure, but fun!! I would love to discuss about my (small) experience if anyone is curious, and have plenty of question to finalize my project, I haven't started the data analysis pipeline yet!
